DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: History Erectile Dysfunction ( ED ) least 3 month duration . Anticipate adult female sexual partner study . Agree use treatment ED participate recording response questionnaires instrument use study . Previous current treatment tadalafil phosphodiesterase type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor . ED cause primary sexual disorder , history radical prostatectomy pelvic surgery subsequent failure achieve erection , history penile implant clinically significant penile deformity . ED cause untreated inadequately treated endocrine disease . Current treatment doxazosin , nitrate , cancer chemotherapy , antiandrogens . Severe renal hepatic impairment , history malignant hypertension . Presence history specific heart condition .
